dict.acceptation: （在食物或饮料中）投放麻醉药，下麻醉药；掺麻醉药于；使服麻醉药；使服毒品；
使服麻醉药，用药麻醉，使服兴奋剂；

sent.orig: As for active treatment,single drug consisted of 42%,two-drug 49% and three-drug 8% and four-drug 1%.
sent.trans: 治疗用药中单一用药占 42 % ,二联用药占 49% ,三联用药占 8% ,四联用药占 1%。

sent.orig: The most common drug which caused serious drug eruptions were sulfa-drug and antiepileptics.
sent.trans: 重型药疹中以磺胺和抗癫痫药物多见。

sent.orig: Drug selling and drug trafficking crime is knowingly and intentionally are drug trafficking, transport behavior.
sent.trans: 贩卖、运输毒品罪，是指明知是毒品而故意实施贩卖、运输的行为。

sent.orig: The drug drug as a block fetherblood thinner.
sent.trans: 这种药扮演着血液稀释剂的角色。

sent.orig: Crude drug or raw materials drug?
sent.trans: 国内说的原料药具体只得是什么阿？
